verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5975>"Stand<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> there this <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8085><s%> 'Hear the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who enter <S%H935>in<s%> at these <S%H8179>gates<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3190>Amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H982>Don't<s%> trust in <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> are these.

For if you <S%H3190>thoroughly<s%> <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings;<s%> if you <S%H6213>thoroughly<s%> <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%>

if you <S%H6231>don't<s%> oppress the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> and <S%H8210>don't<s%> shed <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> neither <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to your own <S%H7451>hurt:<s%>

then will I cause you to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> from of <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
<S%H982>Behold,<s%> you trust in <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that <S%H3276>can't<s%> profit.

Will you <S%H1589>steal,<s%> <S%H7523>murder,<s%> and commit <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> that you have not <S%H3045>known,<s%>

and <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in this <S%H1004>house,<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> We are <S%H5337>delivered;<s%> that you may <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H8441>abominations?<s%>

Is this <S%H1004>house,<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> become a <S%H4631>den<s%> of <S%H6530>robbers<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes?<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I, even I, have seen <S%H5002>it,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

But <S%H3212>go<s%> now to my <S%H4725>place<s%> which was in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> where I caused my <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> what I <S%H6213>did<s%> to it <S%H6440>for<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H6213>Now,<s%> because you have done all these <S%H4639>works,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7925>you,<s%> rising up early and <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> but you <S%H8085>didn't<s%> hear; and I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6030>you,<s%> but you didn't answer:

therefore will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> in which you <S%H982>trust,<s%> and to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> as I <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>
I will cast you <S%H7993>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> as I have cast <S%H7993>out<s%> all your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> even the whole <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6419>don't<s%> pray for this <S%H5971>people,<s%> neither lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7440>cry<s%> nor <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for <S%H1157>them,<s%> neither make <S%H6293>intercession<s%> to <S%H8085>me;<s%> for I will not hear you.
<S%H7200>Don't<s%> you see what they <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1197>kindle<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H3888>knead<s%> the <S%H1217>dough,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3561>cakes<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they may provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>
Do they provoke me to <S%H3707>anger?<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H1322>Don't<s%> they provoke themselves, to the confusion of their own <S%H6440>faces?<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H639>Behold,<s%> my anger and my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be poured <S%H5413>out<s%> on this <S%H4725>place,<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>animal,<s%> and on the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and on the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%> and it shall <S%H1197>burn,<s%> and shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H5595>Add<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat.<s%>

For I <S%H1696>didn't<s%> speak to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> nor <S%H6680>command<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H1697>concerning<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> or <S%H2077>sacrifices:<s%>

but this <S%H1697>thing<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and I will be your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall be my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3190>you,<s%> that it may be well with you.

But they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen nor <S%H5186>turn<s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but <S%H3212>walked<s%> in their own <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and went <S%H268>backward,<s%> and not <S%H6440>forward.<s%>

Since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that your <S%H1>fathers<s%> came forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you all my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and sending <S%H7971>them:<s%>

yet they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H5186>me,<s%> nor inclined their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but made their <S%H6203>neck<s%> <S%H7185>stiff:<s%> they did <S%H7489>worse<s%> than their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H8085>them;<s%> but they will not listen to <S%H7121>you:<s%> you shall also call to <S%H6030>them;<s%> but they will not answer you.

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1471>them,<s%> This is the nation that has not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> nor <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4148>instruction:<s%> <S%H530>truth<s%> is <S%H6>perished,<s%> and is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Cut <S%H1494>off<s%> your <S%H5145>hair,<s%> and throw it <S%H7993>away,<s%> and take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> on the bare <S%H8205>heights;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3988>rejected<s%> and <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> they have <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> to defile <S%H2930>it.<s%>

They have <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> which is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> to <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> which I <S%H6680>didn't<s%> command, nor did it <S%H5927>come<s%> into my <S%H3820>mind.<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that it shall no more be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> nor The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> but The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2028>Slaughter:<s%> for they shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> in <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> until there is <S%H369>no<s%> place to <S%H4725>bury.<s%>

The dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and for the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and none shall frighten them <S%H2729>away.<s%>

Then will I cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and from the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride;<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> shall become a <S%H2723>waste.<s%>
